channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Paint can spilt over street, 12th December
item.description:
Massive can of paint been dropped and split all over the street. If not looked at the whole street will be in even worse state then already is. The cleaners don’t come down this side street one week to another. Been there a few days

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Great Eastern Street, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Tipper lorry on pavement on manor road, 12th December
item.description:
There is a 32 ton tipper lorry on the pavement on manor road, junction of frobisher road. All 8 wheels are on the pavement and this has been there since monday. It looks as though the pavement is also sinking under 1 of the wheels. Company on the lorry is 'ASC' and reg is GN17 XCX. Resident has called the company and they said its taxed and MOT so its allowed to be there and they aren't going to do anything
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Mariners Walk, Slade Green, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
